attributes.action: bomb Iran back to the stone age if they do not release the sailors in the next few days.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only form of communication that Iran understands is violence. Forget all that sending ground troops in nonsense and just raze Tehran to the ground. Forget about collateral damage, no one complained in WWII. They deserve it for their aggressive actions against the UK.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
